jobDesc: Acquired proficiency in building full-stack websites using MongoDB, Express JS, React JS and Node JS through technical classes
Developed RESTful API with CRUD functionality using Express JS and MongoDB, following the principles of N-Layered structure.
Developed website interfaces using React.js, following principles of atomic design.
Completed self-learning placed course from Progate (HTML& CSS, ES6, React JS, Node JS, Git).
Collaborated with a 5-member team to successfully complete the final capstone project.
Created an online store website using wordpress, showcasing eye glass products and ensuring a user friendly browsing experience
Optimized website performance by implementing caching and image compression
Collaborated with a friend to successfully build Djava Optik's online store, integrating payment gateways and order management system
Contributed to maintaining and implementing the design-to-code process for Peduly, utilizing React JS and Tailwind CSS
Contributed to maintaining and implementing the design-to-code process for Admin Peduly, utilizing React JS, Bootstrap and SCSS.
Successfully developed and implemented the design-to-code processes for Involuntir, utilizing Tailwind CSS and React JS.
Collaborated with UI/UX Designer to create visually appealing and user friendly.
Collaborated with Back-end Engineers to create RESTFUL APIs for seamless communication between front-end and back-end systems.

project.title: Nhask
